thread.title_full: EPAY Systems Unveils Geo-fencing Features and More for Mobile Time Tracking App

author: Katie Badeusz
title: EPAY Systems Unveils Geo-fencing Features and More for Mobile Time Tracking App
text:
EPAY Systems, the leading cloud-based time and attendance provider for employers with a distributed workforce, today announced the release of new features to its Blueforce Mobile Punch time tracking application. Mobile Punch 4.0 provides Blueforce time and attendance system users with new capabilities that prevent employee time theft, making it easier for employers to track and manage remote employees, scattered work crews and on-the-go field managers. New Mobile Time Tracking Features
Geo-fencing
In addition to capturing an employee’s GPS location at clock-in/out, the Mobile Punch app now includes geo-fencing to help companies improve employee accountability while they are on the job. Using GPS to designate specific geographical boundaries for worksites, this feature first sends a warning message to workers, and then automatically clocks them out when they leave a designated worksite radius.
Geo-tracking
Geo-tracking helps companies prevent time theft by recording an employee’s geo-coordinates at defined intervals between a clock-in and out period.
Face Capture
The new Face Capture feature reduces time theft by providing added verification to the clock in and out process. Employers can configure it to require workers to capture a photo of themselves on their smartphone when they clock in and/or out.
Check Points
Check Point capabilities can be enabled to help boost productivity and keep employees on track throughout the work day. Employers can set up check points throughout worksites—i.e., posted bar codes—that employees must scan when passing through or completing an activity.
The latest version of Mobile Punch by EPAY Systems is available for use on iPhone® and Android® smartphones as well as iPad® and Android tablets.
About Mobile Punch
EPAY’s native-developed Mobile Punch app with GPS provides an easy and affordable solution for tracking and managing time and attendance for scattered and remote workforces. Mobile Punch lets workers clock in and out for their work day right from their smartphone or tablet and captures clock-in/out date and time as well as GPS location so employers know their employees are exactly where they should be. Any punch made outside an authorized worksite is immediately flagged for manager review.
Mobile Punch can be configured for use by single employees, work crews, and/or managers. Additionally, managers can use Mobile Punch to classify workers by location, task, or work ticket. They can also take advantage of the one-click group clock-in/out option.
Mobile Punch can be used in combination with any of EPAY’s data collection devices including biometric time clocks, telephone time tracking system and web punch option.
About EPAY Systems
EPAY Systems provides a robust time and labor management system that keeps employers in control and in compliance with labor laws and union rules, while reducing labor costs by up to 5% or more. EPAY’s uniquely flexible, cloud-based Blueforce system adapts to the most complex labor environments. With headquarters in Chicago, IL, the company has offices throughout the U.S., Canada, and India, serving 75,000 sites across North America and beyond.
